messages.content: will the paris climate agreements goals be met?

As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or opinions. However, the Paris Agreement's goals are to limit global warming to well below 2°C above pre-industrial levels and to pursue efforts to limit the temperature increase to 1.5°C, and to ensure that greenhouse gas emissions are reduced by at least 50% by 2030 compared to 2010 levels. The agreement has been signed by 195 countries, but achieving these goals will require significant and rapid action from all countries. It is difficult to predict whether these goals will be met, but the agreement provides a framework for countries to work together and take action to address climate change.
are you sure the US withdrawn from the agreement? Biden went back into it!

You're correct, the US did withdraw from the Paris Agreement under the presidency of Donald Trump, but under the Biden administration, the US has re-engaged with the agreement and is working to meet its commitments. The Paris Agreement is a global agreement and all countries are obligated to meet their commitments, even if they are not a part of the agreement.
